history.proof: intros T F FF D. unfold filter_le. intros P H. sfirstorder depth: 3.

exceptions.tactic: apply filter_imp with (Q := fun x : T => D x -> P x).
exceptions.exn: Unable to find an instance for the variable P0.
In environment T : Type F : (T -> Prop) -> Prop FF : Filter F D : T -> Type P : T -> Prop H : F P Unable to unify "F P" with "within D F P".
In environment T : Type F : (T -> Prop) -> Prop FF : Filter F D : T -> Type P : T -> Prop H : F P Unable to unify "?F (fun x : ?T => ?M2411 x /\\ ?M2412 x)" with "F (fun x : T => D x -> P x)".

original: intros T F FF D. unfold filter_le. intros P H. apply filter_imp with (Q := fun x : T => D x -> P x). - intros x H1. apply H, H1. - apply filter_and; apply filter_true.
